name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed PowerShell scripts for sensitive data exfiltration and triggers mitigation actions.

action--d4c2c63f-6fbc-4698-aa32-f312de38.name: Terminate malicious PowerShell processes
action--d4c2c63f-6fbc-4698-aa32-f312de38.description: Terminate any malicious PowerShell processes that might be running.

action--1fe3f22c-aa2e-48eb-853b-c2ab4198.name: Check and block outbound connections to suspicious IPs
action--1fe3f22c-aa2e-48eb-853b-c2ab4198.description: Block outbound connections to a known suspicious IP address.

action--0dcd501e-fd24-48fb-9147-caf1aa23.name: Alert security team
action--0dcd501e-fd24-48fb-9147-caf1aa23.description: Send an alert to the security team about the malicious activity detected.

commands.command: echo 'Security alert: malicious activity detected on host-22' | mail -s 'Incident Report' security@organization.com

action--8f2e1c54-e3b2-4c69-81db-e3a2f0eb.name: Run a full antivirus scan
action--8f2e1c54-e3b2-4c69-81db-e3a2f0eb.description: Perform a full antivirus scan to detect threats.

while-condition--ff7984f4-1ab1-4d1c-b24e.name: Repeat antivirus scan
while-condition--ff7984f4-1ab1-4d1c-b24e.description: Continue scanning until the system is clean.
